title: Horror?
review: It had some intense moments, but in general it was not that scary to me at all. Specially felt more like an homage to Lovecraft in the sense of the slow reduction of human beings to ashes by something behind the curtain. It left me amused by its absurdity and the many, hopefully so intended trashy 'scares' showing the characters as toy figures for the greater 'good'. Its OK.

title: Neat.
review: Be like horses. Feels a bit strechted towards the end.
